mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (subject, contents, req_date, start_date, end_date, views, writer ) VALUES ( #{subject}, #{contents}, #{req_date}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, 0, #{writer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET subject = #{subject}, contents = #{contents}, start_date = #{start_date}, end_date = #{end_date}, writer = #{writer}, update_date = #{update_date} WHERE seq = #{seq}
